title: Connect Pixel 4a to USB C Monitor
content:
Hi, 

Wonder if anyone can help please. 

Does the Pixel 4a support output to an external monitor via USB C, such as the Asus ZenScreen Touch or the Pepper Jobs XtendTouch? 

I have a 4a on pre-order, but if it doesn't support the above I will probably cancel it which is a real shame!

Thanks
